method.name: GET
method.doc: Returns all the answers in the system.

param.name: body
param.doc: When "true", a post's body will be included in the response.

param.name: comments
param.doc: When "true", any comments on a post will be included in the response.

param.name: fromdate
param.doc: Unix timestamp of the minimum creation date on a returned item. Unix epoch date, range [0, 253,402,300,799].

param.name: max
param.doc: Maximum of the range to include in the response according to the current sort. Integer or unix epoch date.

param.name: min
param.doc: Minimum of the range to include in the response according to the current sort. integer or unix epoch date.

param.name: order
param.doc: How the current sort should be ordered. one of desc (default), or asc.

param.name: page
param.doc: The pagination offset for the current collection. Affected by the specified pagesize. 32-bit signed integer.

param.name: pagesize
param.doc: The number of collection results to display during pagination. Should be between 0 and 100 inclusive. 32-bit signed integer.

param.name: sort
param.doc: How a collection should be sorted. one of activity (default), creation, or votes.

param.name: todate
param.doc: Unix timestamp of the maximum creation date on a returned item. Unix epoch date, range [0, 253,402,300,799].

method.doc: Gets the set of answers with ids in id.

param.name: id
param.doc: A single primary key identifier or a vectorized, semicolon-delimited list of identifiers. This is a vectorized parameter, multiple ids can be sent a single request if delimited with a semi-colon.
